A bit about me.....
Hi there! I am Aryan, an 18 year old software developer from India with a passion for electronics. You know, arduino, raspbbery pi, esp32. That kind of stuff. I am currently studying in college, majoring in Computer Science. A self-taught developer and have been coding for the past 5 years. Born with a special love love for dogs and a proud sibling of two Chihuahuas.
